With respect to WHOâ€™s Clean Air Coalition launch, consider the following statements about the C40 network:
  1. India is a part of this network.
  2. Urban flooding is one of the focus areas of the network.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: Indian cities are part of this global network of 94 cities to tackle climate change. Delhi, Bengaluru, Chennai, Kolkata and Jaipur are part of this network. The combined GDP of these 94 cities account for 25% of the global GDP. The cities hold over 650 million people. Statement 2 is correct: The C40 Cities Climate Leadership Group uses peer-to-peer exchange model of technologies and solutions to fight climate change. Some of its focus areas include urban flooding, air quality management, land use planning, clean energy, sustainable waste management, mobility management etc.
